comprehensive_overview: VisiData is a fast, interactive multitool for tabular data. It combines the clarity of a spreadsheet, the efficiency of the terminal, and the power of Python, into a lightweight utility which can handle millions of rows with ease.
core_features: 1. Fast and efficient data manipulation. 2. Customizable visualizations. 3. Integration with Python for scripting and automation. 4. Support for various data formats.
